text: Sebastiano Mannironi (22 July 1930 - 11 June 2015) was an Italian weightlifter. He was born in Nuoro, Sardinia. He competed at the 1956, 1960, and 1964 Summer Olympics. He won a bronze medal at the 1960 Olympics. Mannironi died on 11 June 2015 in Bracciano, aged 84. ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2015 deaths Category:1956 Summer Olympics Category:1964 Summer Olympics Category:Medalists at the 1960 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic bronze medalists for Italy Category:Sportspeople from Sardinia Category:Weightlifters
title: Sebastiano Mannironi
